Html:
I am commonly building custom update packages. There may be a method to do this already that I have missed.
I am looking for a method where if a product that I already built a custom package for makes an update, to basically re-use an existing custom package, but replace the product's installation EXE/MSI files and update the rule sets.
I can import/export the rulesets, but I'd like to be able to export an entire update, make the changes I need and re-import.

Is anything like this already in WPP or could it be added? Thanks!
Effectively, this feature is missing from WPP. In WPP v2 I will add the abillity do save custom update as 'Template'.
